actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Lugar. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Approved for reporting without amendment without recommendation.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without recommendation without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 164.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1132.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1132 (Arms Control and Disarmament Agency funding).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1132.
